data.title: School term dates
data.text:
Schools must be open for 190 days to pupils, and an extra 5 days for teacher training each academic year.

Some schools in North East Lincolnshire follow the term dates and teacher training days set by the Local Authority. However, most schools follow a different pattern. We advise that you check your child’s school website.

Bank Holidays in England – Dates

Bank Holidays – Monday 25 December, Tuesday 26 December 2023 and Monday 1 January 2024

Bank Holidays – Friday 29 March and Monday 1 April 2024

Bank Holidays – Monday 6 May and Monday 27 May 2024

Teacher Training Days

Schools will identify a further 5 training days outside the dates shown.

2024 to 2025 term dates

Bank Holidays in England – Dates

Bank Holidays – Wednesday 25 December, Thursday 26 December 2024 and Wednesday 1 January 2025

Bank Holidays – Friday 18 April and Monday 21 April 2025

Bank Holidays – Monday 5 May and Monday 26 May 2025

Teacher Training Days

Schools will identify a further 5 training days outside the dates shown.

2025 to 2026 term dates

Bank Holidays in England – Dates

Bank Holidays – Thursday 25 December, Friday 26 December 2024 and Thursday 1 January 2026

Bank Holidays – Friday 3 April and Monday 6 April 2026

Bank Holidays – Monday 4 May and Monday 25 May 2026

Teacher Training Days

Schools will identify a further 5 training days outside the dates shown.

Individual School’s Term Dates
